DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of the protocol is to evaluate the efficacy of a protocol for induction of tolerance to peanut ingestion increasing doses. The secondary purpose is to determine the interest of a prolonged maintenance therapy
DOC.brief_title: Peanut Oral Induction Tolerance in Peanut's Allergic Teenagers
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective randomized double blind, placebo controlled, protocol in two phases: 1/ active treatment versus placebo for induction phase; 2/ long versus short maintenance
